rows.label: qev087405_MSG0001
rows.name:
That's odd.
I thought he'd be here at night.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0002
rows.name: [ST:wide ]—So, that place has become the native creatures' base, hasn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0003
rows.name:
If you know that much,
then why can't you eliminate them?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0004
rows.name:
We've already attempted an assault operation.
[ST:wide ]—Twice.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0005
rows.name: And both times, we suffered painful losses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0006
rows.name:
Come to think of it, there were a lot
of damaged Dolls earlier, weren't there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0007
rows.name: The results of a failed mission...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0008
rows.name:
But, if we don't wipe out the native creatures there,
we can't secure the route.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0010
rows.name:
Nevertheless, without rebuilding our fighting strength,
even if you tell us to do it once more[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0011
rows.name: Will there even be a budget for it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0012
rows.name: That[ST:wide ]— I must admit, it would be difficult.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0013
rows.name: Ain't you guys bein' a bit thick-headed?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0014
rows.name: Commander Vandham![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0015
rows.name: How long have you been here[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0016
rows.name: "Thick-headed"? Watch your mouth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0017
rows.name:
That look on your face[ST:wide ]—
it looks like you have some kind of indirect approach in mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0018
rows.name:
Seems Wan's team confirmed
a leader-class individual among the native creatures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0019
rows.name: This one here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0020
rows.name:
If you defeat the leader,
the pack will just scatter[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0021
rows.name:
If you're going to wipe them out, defeating them one-by-one after that
would be considerably easier, I think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0022
rows.name:
That's reasonable enough, but
how do you propose we defeat that leader?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0023
rows.name:
Throw in an elite team for a single-point breakthrough.
Ain't no other way, right?[ST:wide ]—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0024
rows.name: Right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0025
rows.name: Us!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0026
rows.name: Meh!?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0027
rows.name: Hmm[ST:wide ]— It sounds like an interesting mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0028
rows.name:
I see, so that's why
you called Elma's team here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0029
rows.name: You don't miss a trick, Commander.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0030
rows.name: No, that's not it, we were just...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0031
rows.name: Well, somethin' like this is just part of the job, y'know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0032
rows.name: Hey, wait a minute![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0033
rows.name:
It's definitely a mission someone has to do,
Lin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0034
rows.name: I guess so, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0035
rows.name: We'll take this mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev087405_MSG0036
rows.name: That's the spirit.[ST:wait ]
